action.action-desc: Mr. Mullin (for himself and Mr. Gianforte) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To make improvements to the Account For the State Response to the Opioid Abuse Crisis to improve tribal health.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Tribal Addiction and Recovery Act of 2018 or the TARA Act.

section.header: Account For the State Response to the Opioid Abuse Crisis
section.text: Section 1003 of the 21st Century Cures Act (42 U.S.C. 290ee–3 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by inserting and Tribal after State;
in subsection (a), by inserting after within the States the following: , Indian tribes, and tribal organizations;

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting and Tribal after State;
in paragraph (2)(A)(ii), by striking $500,000,000 and inserting $525,000,000; and
in paragraph (3)(B), by inserting and Tribal after State;

clause.text: in the paragraph heading, by striking State response to the opioid and inserting State and tribal response to the opioid;

subclause.text: by inserting after grants to States the following: , Indian tribes, and tribal organizations;
by inserting after such States the following: , Indian tribes, and tribal organizations, respectively; and
by striking in accordance with subparagraph (B) and inserting in accordance with this subsection; and
by inserting after to States the following: , Indian tribes, and tribal organizations; and
by inserting after other States the following: , Indian tribes, and tribal organizations, respectively;
by inserting after to a State the following: , Indian tribe, or tribal organization; and
by inserting after by the State agency the following: or tribal entity;

clause.text: in subparagraph (A), by inserting and tribal after State; and

subclause.text: by inserting , Indian tribe, or tribal organization, as the case may be, after as the State; and
by inserting after within the State the following: , Indian tribe, or tribal organization, respectively; and

subparagraph.text: by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: Grants awarded to a State, Indian tribe, or tribal organization under this subsection may be used to carry out activities to prevent and treat prescription drug abuse and the use of other addictive substances (such as alcohol, heroin, and methamphetamine), including by providing mental health services.

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by inserting , Indian tribe, or tribal organization after A State; and
by inserting , Indian tribe, or tribal organization after the State each place that such term appears;

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsection (f) as subsection (g); and
by inserting after subsection (e) the following new subsection:

subsection.text: In this section, the terms Indian tribe and tribal organization have the meaning given those terms in section 4 of the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act (25 U.S.C. 5304).
